Roll a ten-sided die and add the resulting family heirloom to your starting items. You choose one quality and the GM chooses one quality from the list of item qualities on page 240 of the core rulebook; these are applied to the item.

2-ahnd: Roll a ten-sided die again to determine a skill to aid in learning of your ancestor's fate; gain +1 rank in that skill. Additionally, your ancestor might still be alive, in the Shadowlands...waiting.

2-ahnd: Roll a ten-sided die again to determin your lost family heirloom, which exists somewhere in the world. You choose one quality and the GM chooses one quality; these are applied to the item. You do not know where the heirloom is, but you could later reclaim it during the campaign.
column2: Un 'héritage perdu déterminé par 1 D10 existe quelquepart dans ce monde; Vous et votre MJ choisissez une qualité pour cette objet dans la liste des qualités page 240. Vous ne savez pas où est cet objet mais vous pourrez en prendre possession plus tard dans la campagne

2-ahnd: You gain the Fallen Ancestor disadvantage (see 98). Choose one of your character's rings; you may reduce the value of that ring by 1 to increase the value of your Void Ring by 1 (this still cannot raise it above 3).
column2: Vous avez le désavantage (Ancêtre déchu-page 98), Vous pouvez diminuer un anneau de 1 au profit de votre anneau Vide (sans excéder 3)

2-ahnd: You gain the Haunting (Void) adversity (see page 122 of the core rulebook). This can be assigned in excess of the normal limitations on disadvantages at character creation. Roll a ten-sided die again to determine a Martial skill; gain +1 rank in that skill.
column2: Vous avez le désavantage (Hanté-page 122 et gagnez 1 rang dans une Compétence Martiale déterminée par 1d10

2-ahnd: You gain the Blessed Lineage advantage (see page 103) (this can be assigned in excess of the normal limitations on advantages at character creation).

You gain the Blessed Lineage advantage (see page 103 of the core rulebook). This can be assigned in excess of the normal limitations on disadvantages at character creation. While on the Wall, your glory rank is treated as 1 higher.
column2: Vous bénéficiez de l'avantage (Lignée Bénie-page 103), Votre rang de Gloire est considéré de 1 supérieur sur le Mur

2-ahnd: You know one additional technique. Roll a ten-sided die again to determine the category, and then select one technique with a prerequisite of school rank 1 and learn that technique. You can perform that technique even if it is not normally allowed by your school.
column2: Vous connaissez une technique de rang 1 supplémentaire déterminée par 1d10

2-ahnd: Choose two of your character's rings; you may reduce the value of one of these rings by 1 to increase the value of the other by 1 (this still cannot raise a ring above 3). If you do not do so, choose one item of rarity 6 or lower and assign it to your starting outfit.
column2: Vous pouvez baissez un anneau de 1 pour en augmenter un autre de 1, Si vous ne le faites pas, vous pouvez choisir un objet de rareté 6 ou moins à inclure dans votre équipement de départ
